dict.acceptation: 嗅觉；气味；臭味；发出臭气的人[东西]；
嗅，闻；闻出，发觉，查出；发出…的气味；

sent.orig: I smell with my nose. I can smell a banana.
sent.trans: 我用我的鼻子闻。我能闻到香蕉的味道。

sent.orig: The feel of a feather would smell like my mother's bittersweet smell of coffee.
sent.trans: 羽毛的味道，闻起来感觉像我妈妈煮的半苦半甜的咖啡。

sent.orig: Beer a very distinctive smell. it is quite distinct from the smell of wine.
sent.trans: 啤酒有种特殊的味道，与葡萄酒的味道截然不同。

sent.orig: A peculiar stagnant smell hung over the anchorage-a smell of sodden leaves and rotting tree trunks.
sent.trans: 锚地的上空笼罩着一股奇怪的霉味——是被水浸泡的树叶和腐烂的树干发出的臭气。

sent.orig: Alcohol has a very distinctive smell; it' s quite distinct from the smell of wine.
sent.trans: 酒精有独特的气味，它和葡萄酒的气味明显不同。
